channel.title: You know what would be nice? (Mind Bomb Buyer)
channel.description:
A script that starts in fally west bank, walks to the beer place, talks to kaylee, buys 27 beers then banks them and goes again.
That would be great :)
Anyone who makes it will be greatly appreciated :)
